<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::make&#95;pair(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, std::nullopt);</span></CodeLine>
